title: I need a good champion to play in bronze
body: Hey guys right now i am bronze 2 and i would like to ask you guys for what champs to play to climb further. I can play any lane but i don't really enjoy the support lane. Favourite lane is jungle and adc sometimes. I would really like to learn a new champ and maybe abuse it. I don't know what's better between dmg heavy junglers or tanks.
